editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Dryer, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator, Washer
editedFacts.rooms: Breakfast nook, Family room, Master bath, Pantry, Solarium / Atrium, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription:
Nice 3 Bed, 1.75 Bath Single Family Home with a 2 car garage and large driveway. This home is currently being renovated in preparation to sell. House will come with Brushed Stainless Appliances (Fridge, Stove, Overhead Microwave, and Dishwasher)
Improvements made so far: * NEW paint throughout entire home, walls and ceilings * NEW Laminate Wood Flooring in Living Room, Kitchen, and Master Bedroom (Tile in the rest of the house) * NEW Lighting Fixtures in Kitchen, Entry Way and all porch lights. * Newly, professionally painted Kitchen Cabinets (White) * Stained Bathroom Vanities and New Vanity Tops and Sinks/Faucets
Keep an eye on this property as it is almost ready to be listed for sale!
response.whatOwnerLoves: Super cute home in quiet cul-de-sac. Updated floors in kitchen, living room and and master bedroom. Updated bathrooms and and kitchen (2010 and 2014). Great area. Good schools. Can't ask for more.
